## useEventListener() function

Adds various listeners to the given element and cleans them up when done

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useEventListener(listenerMap: ListenerMap, element: HTMLElement | Window | null | undefined, ...deps: any[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  listenerMap | ListenerMap | The listeners |
|  element | HTMLElement \| Window \| null \| undefined | The element to attach the listeners to |
|  deps | any\[\] | The optional list of dependencies |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
